data.strFullDescription:
[h2] Make Painfully Great Memories with Your Friends in Party Animals. [/h2]


[b] Mess With Your Friend in 100 Different Ways[/b]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/ea12341010fbbd13bf0b82e0a7040c32.poster.avif?t=1753424021" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/ea12341010fbbd13bf0b82e0a7040c32.webm?t=1753424021"][/imgvid]


[b]Or Together You Could Eliminate Others[/b]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/95cf7e1dc2d7f4d911d6c9e9060f5970.poster.avif?t=1753424021" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/95cf7e1dc2d7f4d911d6c9e9060f5970.webm?t=1753424021"][/imgvid]


[b]Teamwork Is Also Highly Appreciated Here[/b]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/5faa7b31f1abe75f4a8cfb9fb8108cf6.poster.avif?t=1753424021" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/5faa7b31f1abe75f4a8cfb9fb8108cf6.webm?t=1753424021"][/imgvid]


[b]Especially When Fighting For Gummy Bear[/b]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/4cf540798fcc50835c2cded3409b219a.poster.avif?t=1753424021" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1260320/extras/4cf540798fcc50835c2cded3409b219a.webm?t=1753424021"][/imgvid]
data.strSnippet: Fight your friends as puppies, kittens and other fuzzy creatures in PARTY ANIMALS! Paw it out with your friends remotely, or huddle together for chaotic fun on the same screen. Interact with the world under our realistic physics engine. Did I mention PUPPIES?
